refnamediv.refpurpose: A choice from multiple check menu items.

refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: A radio menu item is a check menu item that belongs to a group. At each instant exactly one of the radio menu items from a group is selected.
The group list does not need to be freed, as each GtkRadioMenuItem will remove itself and its list item when it is destroyed.

refsect2.para: Returns the group to which the radio menu item belongs, as a GList of GtkRadioMenuItem. The list belongs to GTK+ and should not be freed.
